00038 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 
00041 #include "pizArrayPool.h"
00042 
00043 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 
00046 #include <stdlib.h>
00047 
00048 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 
00051 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_SIZE            0
00052 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_PREALLOCATED    2
00053 
00054 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 
00057 #define PIZLOCK     pthread_mutex_lock (&x->lock);
00058 #define PIZUNLOCK   pthread_mutex_unlock (&x->lock);
00059 
00060 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 
00063 PIZArrayPool *pizArrayPoolNew (long argc, long *argv)
00064 {
00065     PIZArrayPool *x = NULL;
00066     
00067     if (x = (PIZArrayPool *)malloc (sizeof(PIZArrayPool))) {   
00068         long k = PIZ_DEFAULT_PREALLOCATED;
00069         
00070         x->retain           = 0;
00071         x->initArraySize    = PIZ_DEFAULT_SIZE;
00072         x->cache            = NULL;
00073         
00074         if (argc && argv[0] > 0) {
00075             k = argv[0];
00076         }
00077             
00078         if (argc > 1 && argv[1] > 0) {
00079             x->initArraySize = argv[1];
00080         }
00081         
00082         if (x->pool = pizLinklistNew ( )) {
00083             long i;
00084             
00085             pizLinklistSetFlags (x->pool, PIZ_LINKLIST_FLAG_FREE_GROWING_ARRAY);
00086             
00087             for (i = 0; i < k; i++) {
00088                 PIZGrowingArray *array = NULL;
00089                 
00090                 if (array = pizGrowingArrayNew (x->initArraySize)) {
00091                     pizLinklistAppend (x->pool, array);
00092                 }
00093             }
00094             
00095             pthread_mutex_init (&x->lock, NULL);
00096         } else {
00097             free (x);
00098             x = NULL;
00099         }
00100     }
00101     
00102     return x;
00103 }
00104 
00105 void pizArrayPoolFree (PIZArrayPool *x)
00106 {
00107     if (x) {
00108         PIZLOCK
00109         pizLinklistFree (x->pool);
00110         PIZUNLOCK
00111         
00112         pthread_mutex_destroy (&x->lock);
00113         free (x);
00114     }
00115 }
00116 
00117 PIZGrowingArray *pizArrayPoolGetArray (PIZArrayPool *x)
00118 {
00119     long            err = PIZ_ERROR;
00120     PIZGrowingArray *array = NULL;
00121     
00122     PIZLOCK
00123     
00124     if (!x->retain)  {
00125         err = pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (x->pool, 0, (void **)&array);
00126     } else  {
00127         err = pizLinklistNextByPtr (x->pool, (void *)x->cache, (void **)&array);
00128     }
00129     
00130     if (err && (array = pizGrowingArrayNew (x->initArraySize))) {
00131         err = pizLinklistAppend (x->pool, array);
00132     }
00133     
00134     if (!err) {
00135         pizGrowingArrayClear (array);
00136         x->retain ++;
00137         x->cache = array;
00138     }
00139     
00140     PIZUNLOCK
00141         
00142     return array;
00143 }
00144 
00145 PIZError pizArrayPoolReleaseArray (PIZArrayPool *x, PIZGrowingArray *a)
00146 {
00147     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00148     
00149     PIZLOCK
00150     
00151     if (a) {
00152         err = PIZ_GOOD;
00153         x->retain --;
00154     }
00155     
00156     PIZUNLOCK
00157     
00158     return err;
00159 }
